project.description: Build clovr-standard image and upload to Amazon EC2

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPLOAD_EC2
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Upload image to EC2 on a successful build

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUNDLE_TOOLS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Bundle guest tools for VMware and Virtualbox

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SPLASHSCRIPT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Script to install a splash screen on the image

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For recovering a failed build only, leave blank by default for new builds. For failed builds, this is the prefix for the loopback directory that is mounted as BUILD_DIR.live

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For recovering a failed build only, leave blank by default for new builds. For failed builds, this is the target image name, usually clovr-standard-datestring

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SVNTAG
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tag SVN repositories with build name

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /mnt export BUILD_ID=$BUILD_ID export BUILD_DIR=$BUILD_DIR export BUILD_NAME=$BUILD_NAME export UPLOAD_EC2=$UPLOAD_EC2 if [ "$BUNDLE_TOOLS" = "true" ] then bundletools="-t" fi
sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-build -s $SPLASHSCRIPT $bundletools $IMAGE_NAME clovr-standard
bldimgname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'`
if [ "$SVNTAG" = "true" ] then curl "http://localhost:8888/job/Tag%20SVN%20revision%20for%20image/buildWithParameters?BUILD_NAME=clovr-standard-$bldimgname&BUILD_TIME=$BUILD_ID" fi
if [ $? = 0 ] && [ "$UPLOAD_EC2" = "true" ] then curl http://localhost:8888/job/Bundle%20ec2%20image/buildWithParameters?IMAGE_NAME=/mnt/clovr-standard-$bldimgname fi
if [ $? = 0 ] && [ "$UPLOAD_DIAG" = "true" ] then bldimgname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'` curl http://localhost:8888/job/Bundle%20diag%20image/buildWithParameters?IMAGE_NAME=/mnt/clovr-standard-$bldimgname fi
